input.content: You are a senior React+TypeScript engineer. Output ONLY the complete file content of src/App.tsx. No markdown. No explanations.

Create a complete src/App.tsx for a Vite + React + TypeScript app with the following constraints.

ARCHITECTURE:
- Use Layout from "./Layout".
- Use DiagnosticsPanel from "./DiagnosticsPanel".
- Frontend must communicate only via Workers endpoints (e.g. /api/token, /api/samples). Do NOT access Supabase directly.

UI REQUIREMENTS:
- Overall layout is provided by <Layout>.
- Layout props:
  - pageTitle: string
  - onHome(): navigate to Samples page
- Inside the card area:
  - Show navigation buttons: "Samples" and "Diagnostics".
  - Buttons must have blue background and white text.
  - Active page button should be slightly darker.
  - Hover state should be slightly darker.
- The page title is passed to Layout.pageTitle and appears at the top-left inside the card.

BEHAVIOR REQUIREMENTS:
- On app startup:
  1) POST /api/token with credentials: include
  2) Then GET /api/samples with credentials: include
- Samples page:
  - Show Reload button to re-fetch samples.
  - Render a table with columns:
    - sample_code
    - title
    - current_step
    - updated_at (formatted to local time string)
- Diagnostics page:
  - Render <DiagnosticsPanel /> inside Layout.

STATE & NAVIGATION:
- App.tsx manages which page is active (Samples | Diagnostics).
- Clicking "QRDemo" in Layout (onHome) always navigates back to Samples.

IMPLEMENTATION RULES:
- Use React hooks (useState, useEffect, useCallback, etc.).
- Use inline styles only (no external UI libraries).
- Avoid unused imports (noUnusedLocals is enabled).
- Keep the code simple and readable.

Output ONLY the full content of src/App.tsx.
